section.title: Superlative adjectives
section.sectiontitle: We use the + adjective + -est to compare more than two things.
section.text1: Sarah is 21. Hannah is 19. Kate is 25.
section.sectiontitle2: With most adjectives of two syllables or more we use the + most + adjective.
section.text3a: Picasso was the most famous artist of the twentieth century.
section.text4a: It was the most successful film ever.

section.title: Superlative adjectives
section.text2a: I feel worse today than I did yesterday.
